description: Application for non-material amendment to vary the plans approved under condition 1 and vary the wording of condition B pursuant to Section 73 application reference 21/0130/VAROPDC dated 26 August 2022 to vary Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission (19/0104/VAROPDC) for a “Section 73 application to vary Conditions 1 (Approved Plans), A (Building Heights) and B (Floorspace) of planning permission (17/0055/FUMOPDC) for the demolition of existing buildings and structures and the redevelopment of the site to provide two new buildings comprising ground floor flexible non-residential floorspace (Use Classes A1/A2/A3/ A4/B1/D1/D2), ground floor workspace (Use Class B1/Artist Studios) and residential units (Use Class C3) with disabled car parking, plant space, amenity space, landscaping and associated works” to increase the number of affordable housing units and make minor changes to the external appearance including reducing the height of the tower.
